title: Issue 357
summary: MAUI UI July, what  a month! .NET Conf Focus on MAUI incomming!

items.description:
G'day everyone, welcome to issue #357 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of the community articles around Xamarin and MAUI communities.

Over 30 crackingly good links in this weeks issue, which is what happens when I skip a week. So many great articles coming from MAUI UI July and a special call out to .NET Conf Focus on MAUI coming up soon as well!

Enjoy the links and until next time, have a wonderful week!

Kym
items.description_markdown:
G'day everyone, welcome to issue #357 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of the community articles around Xamarin and MAUI communities.

Over 30 crackingly good links in this weeks issue, which is what happens when I skip a week.  So many great articles coming from MAUI UI July and a special call out to .NET Conf Focus on MAUI coming up soon as well!

Enjoy the links and until next time, have a wonderful week!

Kym

items.title: Announcing .NET Conf - Focus on .NET MAUI, Reactor, and Community Events
items.description:
Ready to get building with .NET MAUI? Join us for .NET Conf - Focus on MAUI, worldwide Reactor events, and local community event opportunities.

items.description_markdown:
Ready to get building with .NET MAUI? Join us for .NET Conf - Focus on MAUI, worldwide Reactor events, and local community event opportunities.

items.title: Free Figma Component Library
items.description:
We've curated the best Figma components in one place. Discover, copy and paste UI components in Figma with the most efficient way to build designs. Get all the essentials for any design project in one place. From buttons to data visualizations, you'll find the perfect component here with a few clicks.

items.description_markdown:
We've curated the best Figma components in one place. Discover, copy and paste UI components in Figma with the most efficient way to build designs. items.title: Playing video with .NET MAUI
items.description:
Many apps, whether mobile or desktop, require the ability to play video. That video may be remote, stored in the app bundle, or be chosen from the user’s device. However, .NET MAUI currently doesn’t have a view (control) capable of playing video. So, David Britch went head and created a cross-platform Video view.

Playing video with .NET MAUI by David Britch
items.description_markdown:
Many apps, whether mobile or desktop, require the ability to play video. That video may be remote, stored in the app bundle, or be chosen from the user’s device. However, .NET MAUI currently doesn’t have a view (control) capable of playing video. So, David Britch went head and created a cross-platform Video view.

[**Playing video with .NET MAUI**](https://www.davidbritch.com/2022/07/playing-video-with-net-maui_28.html) by [David Britch](https://twitter.com/britchdavid)

items.title: Implement Lottie Animations in .NET MAUI Under 10 Minutes!
items.description:
The looks of your app can make of break it. To make your .NET MAUI app infinitely more beautiful you can use Lottie animations! Lottie is a lightweight animation format that can be used on all kinds of platforms, now also including .NET MAUI. Let's learn how easy it is to implement Lottie animations in .NET MAUI with the help of SkiaSharp!

Implement Lottie Animations in .NET MAUI Under 10 Minutes! by Gerald Versluis
items.description_markdown:
The looks of your app can make of break it. To make your .NET MAUI app infinitely more beautiful you can use Lottie animations! Lottie is a lightweight animation format that can be used on all kinds of platforms, now also including .NET MAUI. Let's learn how easy it is to implement Lottie animations in .NET MAUI with the help of SkiaSharp!

[**Implement Lottie Animations in .NET MAUI Under 10 Minutes!**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o5X5yXdWpuc) by [Gerald Versluis](https://twitter.com/jfversluis)

embedded_links.title: **Implement Lottie Animations in .NET MAUI Under 10 Minutes!**

items.title: Unit Testing .NET MAUI Apps with xUnit
items.description:
Having trouble adding a xUnit project to your .NET MAUI solution? Then this video is for you! In this video we will see what it takes to add an xUnit Unit Testing project to your .NET MAUI solution and actually make it build. Sorry, you'll need to write the tests yourself... 😅

Unit Testing .NET MAUI Apps with xUnit by Gerald Versluis
items.description_markdown:
Having trouble adding a xUnit project to your .NET MAUI solution? Then this video is for you! In this video we will see what it takes to add an xUnit Unit Testing project to your .NET MAUI solution and actually make it build. Sorry, you'll need to write the tests yourself... 😅

[**Unit Testing .NET MAUI Apps with xUnit**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C9vIDLQwc7M) by [Gerald Versluis](https://twitter.com/jfversluis)

items.title: Let's Learn .NET - Blazor Hybrid
items.description:
In this month’s .NET beginner series, learn how to blend desktop and mobile native client frameworks with .NET and Blazor! We'll get you up to speed with building .NET MAUI apps that can take advantage of native capabilities, using your web skills. Come to learn something new and leave with something that we all built, together, live with experts!

Let's Learn .NET - Blazor Hybrid by dotNet Youtube Channel
items.description_markdown:
In this month’s .NET beginner series, learn how to blend desktop and mobile native client frameworks with .NET and Blazor! We'll get you up to speed with building .NET MAUI apps that can take advantage of native capabilities, using your web skills. Come to learn something new and leave with something that we all built, together, live with experts! 

[**Let's Learn .NET - Blazor Hybrid**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iI058EA_maE) by [dotNet Youtube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/ucvtt19mzw8dq5wwfu6b0oxw)

items.title: What is a Scoped .NET Dependency, and Why You Should Use Them
items.description:
Just when you thought you knew everything about .NET Dependency Injection, Scoped dependencies comes along. James has covered transient and singleton, but what are scoped dependencies, when would you use them, and should you even care? James breaks it all down.

What is a Scoped .NET Dependency, and Why You Should Use Them by James Montemagno
items.description_markdown:
Just when you thought you knew everything about .NET Dependency Injection, Scoped dependencies comes along. James has covered transient and singleton, but what are scoped dependencies, when would you use them, and should you even care? James breaks it all down.


[**What is a Scoped .NET Dependency, and Why You Should Use Them**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HMN26wQ8J54) by [James Montemagno](https://twitter.com/jamesmontemagno)

embedded_links.title: **What is a Scoped .NET Dependency, and Why You Should Use Them**
